TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOutputSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Define a interface que associa um canal de saída a uma sessão.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel> interface indica que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> semântica.
O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> associado com um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel> podem ser recuperados por meio de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> propriedade.
